title: Software Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Interaction Between Digital Media and Educational Systems: Learning Design Perspectives

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Fundamental Social Studies Concepts Comprehension
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can develop a framework for analyzing the social and educational impacts of digital media
Learners can design strategies for the complementary use of digital technology and traditional educational methods
Learners can complete a project (portfolio/report) evaluating their learning experiences in a digital media environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
